title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 24, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 24, 2020
description:
On Today's Episode of the Dan Patrick Show the boys return from an extended weekend and recap all things NBA Playoffs, including the rise of Luka Doncic. We're joined by Former NBA Player/Turner Sports Analyst Chris Webber and HOF Broadcaster Al Michaels. Plus DP tells you why this has been the craziest 365 day span in sports history.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
